name: mailgun
description: A Pulumi package for creating and managing Mailgun resources.
attribution: This Pulumi package is based on the [`mailgun` Terraform Provider](https://github.com/terraform-providers/terraform-provider-mailgun).

name.description: The domain to add to Mailgun

provider.description:
The provider type for the mailgun package. By default, resources use package-wide configuration
settings, however an explicit `Provider` instance may be created and passed during resource
construction to achieve fine-grained programmatic control over provider settings. See the
[documentation](https://www.pulumi.com/docs/reference/programming-model/#providers) for more information.

name.description: The domain to add to Mailgun

receivingRecords.description: A list of DNS records for receiving validation.

region.description: The region where domain will be created. Default value is `us`.

sendingRecords.description: A list of DNS records for sending validation.

smtpLogin.description: The login email for the SMTP server.

smtpPassword.description: The password to the SMTP server.

spamAction.description:
`disabled` or `tag` Disable, no spam
filtering will occur for inbound messages. Tag, messages
will be tagged with a spam header.

wildcard.description:
Boolean that determines whether
the domain will accept email for sub-domains.

wildcard.description:

stateInputs.description: Input properties used for looking up and filtering Domain resources.
